name: Life of a Battery
description:
My submission to the Ludum Dare 46 game jam that BARELY made to said game jam xD.  I only had time to make 5 levels, hopefully that's enough for now.  Maybe I'll add some more another time.

This is Life of a Battery.  

You are a small android, alone and trapped in a strange place you do not know.  There is no way out, but there is a bigger problem.  You need to survive.  Your battery is going down all the time, and if you don't do something, it will die - lose all of its life -and so will you.

You need to keep your battery alive until it's time for the door to the next level to appear.

Try to survive with as much battery life as you can!

If you like it, make sure to give it some votes / ratings on the Ludum Dare game jam.
